Package civitas.celestis.graphics.model

Class ModelFace3

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.model.ModelFace3
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelFace<Double3>
public class ModelFace3 extends Object implements ModelFace<Double3>
A model face with three-dimensional vertices.
